ajp_menu.title: Custom Tools

submenu.title: GRID Menu (mode='grid_3x1')
submenu.info: Simple GRID Submenu (will stretch small icons to fit the picture area)

submenu.title: GRID Menu (mode='grid1_3x3')
submenu.info: Simple GRID Submenu (will not stretch small icons to fit the picture area)

item.name: External Menu File
item.info: Open a menu from another XML file

item.info: xml file by biko have a coustm codes - plugins - ....

item.name: Elie

ajp_menu.item: opkg install xz opkg install zip #opkg install /tmp/*ipk

item.name: Internal Script
item.info: Simple Script within the Custom Menu XML file

ajp_menu.item:
# ========================================================== echo echo ">>>> [ Testing delayed commands ] <<<<" SLEEP=0.3 ls -d /bin/busybox ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/cat ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/chmod ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/df ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/echo ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/ls ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/ln ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/mount ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/sh ; sleep $SLEEP ls -d /bin/uname
# Check if opkg status file exists echo echo ">>>> [ Checking OPKG Status File ] <<<<" if test -f /var/lib/opkg/status; then echo "File exists." else echo "File NOT FOUND" fi
# Check if xz is installed echo echo ">>>> [ Checking 'xz' Package ] <<<<" if which xz >/dev/null; then echo xz is already installed; else echo 'xz' not installed; fi # ==========================================================
